lead_paragraph: Two Indian competitors have proclaimed their innocence after testing positive for banned steroids just days before they were to leave for the 2016 Olympic Games in Rio.

headline.print_headline: Indian Rio Hopefuls Claim Innocence on Doping
headline.main: Indian Rio Hopefuls Claim Innocence on Doping

snippet: Two Indian competitors have proclaimed their innocence after testing positive for banned steroids just days before they were to leave for the 2016 Olympic Games in Rio....
